name: Firework Simulator 2
description:
Make and customize your fireworks even more than you could before with the sequel to Firework Simulator

Rebuilt from the ground up, Firework Simulator 2 acts as a successor to Firework Simulator Classic in every way. In this version you can fully customize your rocket's colors and patterns, and modify height and launch time without the hassle of calculations weighing you down.

Editing your explosions is more fluent, doing away with the restrictive 7x7 grid and replacing it with a canvas you can draw on with the mouse, along with the ability to choose from the color palette you created, or let the sparks choose their own color at random.

Firework Simulator Classic was built as a chemistry project, and thus had to follow a rubric that restricted the possibilities and menus, but now that it's been redone as a personal project, everything is now totally in your hands.

Have fun building rockets, and if this discussion board feature works the way I think it will, you can share pictures and videos of your rockets with other people who have the game!
